sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_msg_content_7689aafa13b8b300bb053092e144b076
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Schwab Push Notifications </name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">05ed2fb177002300258da2e2c81061c2</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {
	
	var layoutFieldGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
	var identifier = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "additional_information");
	var description = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");
	var status = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");

	var json = {};

	// build JSON sent by push here


	json = {
		"aps" : {
			"sound" : "default"
		},
		"Redirection" : {
			"Title" : "Risk Record Updated Push Notification",
			"To" : "Embedded",
			"Destination": {
				"DocumentId": "af7052fe13f4b300bb053092e144b0f7",
				"ItemId": current.sys_id
			}
		},
		"Layout" : {
			"Identifier" : current.number,
			"Description" : current.state,
			//"AdditionalInfo" : current.location.getDisplayValue(),
			//"StatusImage": current.priority_image + ".iix?t=small"
		}
	};


	return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brian.clauzel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-17 23:01:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>7689aafa13b8b300bb053092e144b076</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Schwab Push Notifications </sys_name><sys_package display_value="GRC Mobile App" source="x_snc_schwab_mobil">b119ed3613f0b300bb053092e144b083</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC Mobile App">b119ed3613f0b300bb053092e144b083</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_7689aafa13b8b300bb053092e144b076</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brian.clauzel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-18 17:11:09</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_msg_content_03252a0b13343700bb053092e144b062
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Schwab Push Notification Task</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">05ed2fb177002300258da2e2c81061c2</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {
	var layoutFieldGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
	var identifier = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "short_description");
	var description = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");
	var status = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");

 var json = {};

 // build JSON sent by push here
 
   json = {
        "aps" : {
            "sound" : "default"
        },
        "Redirection" : {
            "Title" : "New Task Push Notification",
            "To" : "Embedded",
            "Destination": {
                "DocumentId": "d0ca4a8313703700bb053092e144b06f",
                "ItemId": current.sys_id
            }
        },
        "Layout" : {
            "Identifier" : current.short_description,
            "Description" : current.state,
            //"AdditionalInfo" : current.location.getDisplayValue(),
            //"StatusImage": current.priority_image + ".iix?t=small"
        }
    };

 return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brian.clauzel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-18 17:20:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>03252a0b13343700bb053092e144b062</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Schwab Push Notification Task</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GRC Mobile App" source="x_snc_schwab_mobil">b119ed3613f0b300bb053092e144b083</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC Mobile App">b119ed3613f0b300bb053092e144b083</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_03252a0b13343700bb053092e144b062</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brian.clauzel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-18 17:35:08</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_msg_content_d418bfd713f0b700bb053092e144b010
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Schwab Push Notification Respond State</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">05ed2fb177002300258da2e2c81061c2</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {
	
	var layoutFieldGenerator = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
	var identifier = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "short_description");
	var description = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");
	var status = layoutFieldGenerator.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "state");

 var json = {};

 // build JSON sent by push here
	
	   json = {
        "aps" : {
            "sound" : "default"
        },
        "Redirection" : {
            "Title" : "Issue has Changed State",
            "To" : "Embedded",
            "Destination": {
                "DocumentId": "7d43df4b13383700bb053092e144b040",
                "ItemId": current.sys_id
            }
        },
        "Layout" : {
            "Identifier" : current.short_description,
            "Description" : current.state,
            //"AdditionalInfo" : current.location.getDisplayValue(),
            //"StatusImage": current.priority_image + ".iix?t=small"
        }
    };

 return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>brian.clauzel</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-19 17:59:40</sys_created_on><sys_id>d418bfd713f0b700bb053092e144b010</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Schwab Push Notification Respond State</sys_name><sys_package display_value="GRC Mobile App" source="x_snc_schwab_mobil">b119ed3613f0b300bb053092e144b083</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="GRC Mobile App">b119ed3613f0b300bb053092e144b083</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_d418bfd713f0b700bb053092e144b010</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>brian.clauzel</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-19 18:46:54</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>
